abstract: Prince George of Wales, the heir-presumptive to the throne, became patron of a nautical society.
lead_paragraph: LONDON — Prince George of Wales having been asked to become patron of the British and Foreign Sailors’ Society, has replied, through Sir Francis De Winton, as fol­lows: —
snippet: Prince George of Wales, the heir-presumptive to the throne, became patron of a nautical society....

headline.main: 1982: Prince George of Wales Accepts Patronship
